casebody.data:
Certiorari Granted.

No. 512. No. 527. Bell, Superintendent of Banks, v. Singer; and Singer v. Yokohama Specie Bank, Ltd. et al. Court of Appeals of New York. Edward Feldman for Bell, petitioner in No. 512 and respondent in No. 527. Albert R. Connelly and George S. Collins for Singer. Solicitor General Perlman filed a memorandum in No. 512 for the United States, as amicus curiae, urging that the petition therein be granted.

Certiorari granted.
